message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement at a price of $950000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $1000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of our product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $850000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am still aiming to keep my investment within $1000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $825000.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. My counteroffer is $837500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am glad we are getting closer to finding a fair price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $830000.
I appreciate your effort in reaching a fair price, Bob. My counteroffer is $835000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $832500.
Considering your latest offer, I am willing to accept $834375 as the final price for the product.
